medical_history.chief_complaint: Sudden onset of right upper quadrant abdominal pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began suddenly at roughly 11 PM the night before admission and woke the patient from sleep. The patient has a history of similar symptoms leading to a prior ERCP.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Peripheral vascular disease with non-healing RLE ulcer, COPD, right posterior upper lobe infiltrate, depression with psychotic features, methadone maintenance for prior IV drug abuse, Hirschsprung disease, hypertension, right breast cancer status post lumpectomy and radiation therapy, right hip fracture status post total hip replacement.
